channel.title: Help Please
channel.description:
Hello im trying to make a website using SMF, PHP and MySQL I don't really understand how to do it if anyone can help please post here or add me on msn: GodOfLegend@hotmail.com
Thankyou

item.description:

item.title: Help Please
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“davidude36, post:7, topic:190691”][quote author=error.login link=topic=254218.msg2120365#msg2120365 date=1205958101]

WHO TAKE OFF MY RICK ROLL LINK!?
[center] I was trying to be nice.[/center]

i think there should be a sticky saying something like ‘Dont know how to set up a forum? dont bother it will be a failure.’ although then it would never get read
[/quote]
Yeah it makes me feel sad for noobs sometimes when they set up a smfforfree forum and thinks everyone will join and it will be happy. In reality its fucking hard to find users for a forum without having something to bring them there in the first place.[/quote]

Yeah especially communities that branch off from sites like this. They make a site almost exactly the same. At most, 20 will join but probably under 5. Pretty much the only way to have a successful mitb clone is for this forum to die, and the vast majority of elite members move to the new community.

Read full topic

item.title: Help Please
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

[quote=“error.login, post:5, topic:190691”][quote author=nator123123 link=topic=254218.msg2119904#msg2119904 date=1205918125]
WHO TAKE OFF MY RICK ROLL LINK!?
[center] I was trying to be nice.[/center]
[/quote]
i think there should be a sticky saying something like ‘Dont know how to set up a forum? dont bother it will be a failure.’ although then it would never get read[/quote]
Yeah it makes me feel sad for noobs sometimes when they set up a smfforfree forum and thinks everyone will join and it will be happy. In reality its fucking hard to find users for a forum without having something to bring them there in the first place.

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“God Of Legend, post:1, topic:190691”]Hello im trying to make a website using SMF, PHP and MySQL I don’t really understand how to do it if anyone can help please post here or add me on msn: GodOfLegend@hotmail.com

Thankyou[/quote]Rofl SMF, PHP, and MySQL are different things, thats funny, nice reply legit.
Hmm, I made my first forum on, www.freeforums.org or w/e, its fast and simple, nothing to buy.

item.title: Help Please
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

For the love of God…

You’re ignorant, and incapable of making a forum. Even if you did make one, the community would be a failure. Wasted space on the internet.

Go to http://www.zetaboards.com, there, you will learn how to make a forum.

Read full topic
